name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: QUICK dYdX - dYdX Trade Support Extension

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is a tool to help you trade on the Ethereum Layer-2 dex 'dYdX'.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
QUICK dYdX is an extension that supports trading on Ethereum Layer-2 dex 'dYdX'.

After installation and transition to the dYdX trade site, the extension will be activated.
dYdX TestNet : https://trade.stage.dydx.exchange
dYdX MainNet : https://trade.dydx.exchange

You can select a currency and use the following functions
  * Check real-time best ask and best bid
  * Check real-time positions and orders
  * Create new market and limit orders
  * One order cancel, one market orders cancel and all market orders cancel  
  * Update order price
  * Quickly enter order amount and price
  * Automatic limit order calculation
  * and more


This extension was created with the support of the dYdX grants program.
  * https://dydxgrants.com/


Disclaimer
This extension is a trading support tool and does not guarantee trading profits.
The creator of this extension is not responsible for any trouble, loss, or damage caused by the use of this extension.
